title: Flexibility in Scheduling
text: Online learning platforms allow students to learn at their own pace and schedule, making it easier to balance other commitments.

title: Access to Diverse Courses
text: Students can access a wide range of courses from different institutions, broadening their learning opportunities.

title: Cost-Effectiveness
text: Online courses often cost less than traditional classes, saving money on commuting and materials.

title: Interactive Learning Tools
text: Many platforms offer interactive tools like quizzes and forums to enhance learning.

hintAnswer: They offer flexibility in scheduling and access to a wide range of courses from anywhere.
